thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 84 of 1961
thread.title: Mark Ferris

author: Mark Ferris
title: Mark Ferris
text: No issues with the service and booking procedure. Although the worst weather of the winter the operative arrived well within the agreed timeframe and the tyre was fitted quickly and efficiently. The only quibble I have is the necessity of having to pay a small fee to secure a two hour window for the job to be done given I booked it two days before. Would be happy to use them again for the convenience alone even though they are a little more expensive then going to a tyre fitting centre
